author: pipermerriam
content: I just realized that retrieval of contract bytecode is going to exceed the UDP packet size and will have to be sent over uTP in most cases meaning that the CONTENT message of the FINDCONTENT/CONTENT pair can be any of 1) the content 2) ENR records that are closer 3) a uTP `connection_id` for the stream through which the content will be sent.
